Florence Virtual Keyboard for Qt Documentation

1.0.0

Reference documentation of Florence Virtual Keyboard for Qt.

Introduction

Florence-QT is a virtual keyboard that can be used to input text in an input widget. This document is the reference documentation for developers.

Getting started

The only class you need to use is the Florence class. Florence is a QWidget that can be integrated in your QT application. You can connect your input widget's slots to Florence's signals.

Read the hello world tutorial for step by step instructions. Compile and try the demo application to learn more about the possibilities offered.
